name: Packing
description:
A game made as an example for Girl Game Maker Day.

This project was made using the Playground Project to be used as an example of the PickUpAndHold script, as well as Unity Tilemaps. Created for and shown at Girl Game Maker Day.

Movement: WASD

Pick up: B

Drop: N

Playground Project: https://github.com/UnityTechnologies/PlaygroundProject

Art: Kenney Assets
